docs.snippet: Not long ago, social media features were a must-have for any tech company. But the Russian disinformation campaign has put them in an unflattering light.

headline.print_headline: Not Long Ago ‘Social’ Was Hot. Now Tech Giants Are Running From It.
headline.main: Russia Investigation Has Tech Giants Shying From ‘Social’ Label

docs.snippet: Following scrutiny of Facebook and Twitter, the search giant is examining if Russians used its services to meddle in last year’s election.

headline.print_headline: Google Says It Will Work With Congress on Inquiries Into Russian Election Meddling
headline.main: Google Prepares to Brief Congress on Its Role in Election

docs.snippet: Why the government seems paralyzed in the face of the power and influence of companies like Apple, Google and Microsoft.

headline.main: Can Washington Stop Big Tech Companies? Don’t Bet on It

docs.snippet: Apple’s Watch has a bug, Facebook might be undermining democracy, and Amazon is telling us how to make bombs. Tech news is weird right now.

headline.print_headline: Farhad’s and Mike’s Week in Tech: A Very Bad Week for Digital Giants
headline.main: Farhad’s and Mike’s Week in Tech: A Very Bad Week for Digital Giants

docs.snippet: In Silicon Valley, small companies used to unseat big ones. Now the clutches of the five biggest tech companies are hard to escape.

headline.print_headline: A Frightful Stranglehold On Tech Start-Ups
headline.main: How the Frightful Five Put Start-Ups in a Lose-Lose Situation

docs.snippet: Meeting at the U.N., the officials challenged Silicon Valley to keep terrorists from recruiting on the internet. The companies said they were trying.

headline.print_headline: World Leaders Urge Silicon Valley to Police Terrorist Content
headline.main: World Leaders Urge Big Tech to Police Terrorist Content

docs.snippet: At the height of the 2016 election, exaggerated reports of a juvenile sex crime brought a media maelstrom to Twin Falls — one the Idaho city still hasn’t recovered from.

headline.print_headline: How Fake News Turned a Small Town Upside Down
headline.main: How Fake News Turned a Small Town Upside Down

docs.snippet: Apple, Google and other tech giants are pushing deeper into cultural industries — and stumbling in ways that suggest a certain cluelessness.

headline.print_headline: The Rise and Stumbles of the Digital Giants
headline.main: The Frightful Five Want to Rule Entertainment. They Are Hitting Limits.
